title.rendered: “IDF Strikes: Successful Operations Against Terrorist Cells in Gaza City and Rafah”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Combat fighters from the Alexandroni Brigade (3) and the Air Force eliminated a terrorist cell that was identified laying an explosive device in the area of Gaza City; forces from Division 162 attacked an anti-tank position in the Rafah area and eliminated terrorists who posed a threat to them.

The operations of Division 162 in the Rafah area continue. Combat teams from the Nahal Brigade, in cooperation with the Air Force, attacked an anti-tank position from which fire was directed at our forces, as well as a terrorist cell that posed a threat in the area. Additionally, combat fighters from Brigade 401 destroyed several underground shafts and identified terrorist infrastructures in the region.

Combat fighters from the Alexandroni Brigade (3) eliminated several terrorists during close-quarter battles in the area of Gaza City. In one of the operations, a terrorist cell was identified moving in the area and attempting to plant an explosive device near the fighters; shortly thereafter, in conjunction with the Air Force, the forces attacked and eliminated the cell.

Attached is documentation of the forces’ activities in the strip: https://bit.ly/3WkAR6p

Attached is documentation from IDF attacks in the strip: https://bit.ly/4bGWtOP

Attached are images from IDF operations in the strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC1407202428908404
